short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension to help you stay motivated

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:
PuppeRNG is a delightful and fun Chrome extension designed to boost user motivation and mood by providing them with random, cute, and inspiring content. The extension features a user-friendly pop-up that generates a random name, displays a cute cat or dog picture, and suggests an uplifting song. Whether you're feeling a bit down, need a break from work, or simply want to add some positivity to your day, PuppeRNG has got you covered!

Key Features:

Random Name Generator: Upon activating the extension or clicking its icon in the Chrome toolbar, a pop-up window appears with a friendly greeting and a randomly generated name. The names are carefully curated to sound unique, creative, and often whimsical, adding a personal touch to the experience.

Adorable Cat or Dog Pictures: Once the pop-up window appears, users are treated to the heartwarming sight of a cute cat or dog picture. The images are sourced from various platforms, ensuring a diverse collection of furry friends to brighten up the user's day.

Uplifting Song Suggestions: To complement the charming visual content, PuppeRNG offers a handpicked selection of motivational and feel-good songs. The extension displays the song title and artist, along with a link to either a music video or a streaming service where users can listen to the track.
